1.content: Analyze the current deployment configuration issue
1.details: 1. Examine the current vercel.json and deployment structure. 2. Identify why API endpoints return HTML instead of JSON. 3. Determine if the deployment platform supports serverless functions.

2.details: 1. Modify the deployment structure to properly handle API functions. 2. Update configuration files if needed. 3. Ensure API endpoints are properly routed and handled.

3.content: Test and verify the production deployment
3.details: 1. Deploy the fixed version. 2. Test API endpoints return proper JSON responses. 3. Test complete user workflows (create invoice, send email). 4. Verify both frontend and backend work together.
